title: The Steam Spy
description: From New York Times Bestselling Author Todd McCaffrey"A Modern Master Of The Craft"Looking for a thrilling historical adventure filled with espionage, danger, and intrigue? Look no further than The Steam Spy! Set in the aftermath of Bonnie Prince Charlie's victory over King George in 1745, this gripping tale follows the story of Claire Honor Evans, a 14-year-old girl hired by Captain Willoughby Rice Morton to undertake a top-secret mission to save England.Rumors abound that King Charles has no army, no Steam Walkers, and England is defenseless. With the fate of the country hanging in the balance, it is up to Claire to use all her cunning, skill, and determination to outwit their enemies and help England emerge victorious.The Steam Spy is the exciting sequel to The Steam Walker, and is packed with action, adventure, and unforgettable characters. From the wilds of the Colonies to the bustling streets of London, this book will take you on a journey through a fascinating and turbulent period in history.So why wait? Order your copy of The Steam Spy today and experience the thrill of this epic tale of bravery, loyalty, and sacrifice!
author: Todd McCaffrey
